author: midas-bar
title: Midas Bar Kicks Off soon; Official Announcement for Midas Bar, A Member Of The Midas Group
body:
With an increase in the way people tend to enjoy the night (we call them nightcrawlers), it has proven that wine (either alcoholic or non-alcoholic) has been on the increase. Midas is a brand that is determined to give the best of her hospitality and comfort to customers who want to relax and catch fun any time of the day from wine bars, wine cafes, restaurants, nightclubs, pools, hotels.

Midas wine bar is set to give a first-class service to customers who will be spending time at the bar while relaxing or refreshing the body, thereby meeting the different tastes of consumers through selling their prefered brand. Midas bar will be available seven days a week for the enjoyment and satisfaction of our customers.

### Graphical History and Data on Wine Consumption

author: midas-bar
title: A Company's Employee Are It's Greatest Asset
body:
Have you lay off an employee only to find out that it has left a vacuum, not because someone else did not take the position but because certain skill-sets and knowledge became irreplaceable by the person taken the position. One thing to bear in mind that a company is only as good as its people, it does not matter what you sell.

The efficiency, talent and skill of thee employees determines the pace and growth of the organizations since they are the intermediary between the customers and the organization. In an organisation, it is key that employees give their best when they are motivated and shown a sign of belonging that they are a part of the organization.
